nodes.text: "Doctor Death: The Tale of Dr. Evazan and Ponda Baba"

"Doctor Death: The Tale of Dr. Evazan and Ponda Baba" is a short story about Cornelius Evazan and Ponda Baba. Kenneth C. Flint wrote the story for Tales from the Mos Eisley Cantina, which Bantam Spectra published in August 1995.
